items.sentence: Tom didn\'t pay me as much as he promised he would.
Tom doesn\'t believe a word of what Mary just said.
Let\'s not forget the main purpose of this meeting.
Let\'s not lose any more time than we already have.
Let\'s not repeat the same mistakes we made before.
Let\'s schedule a meeting sometime early next week.
Let\'s see if we can speed up the process a little.
Let\'s stop wasting time and get on with this work.
Tom sent his son to a boarding school in Australia.
Tom sent text messages to Mary several times a day.
